column2: "Hom mbra ma yɛnsan nkɔ EWURADZE nkyɛn. Oepirapira hɛn naaso ɔbɛsa hɛn yarba; ɔabobɔ hɛn a

column3: ɔbɛma yeenya nkwa bio: da a otsia ebiasa no
hom mma yɛnka do nhu EWURADZE; no mpuei si pi dɛ adzekyee: na ɔbɛba hɛn nkyɛn dɛ nyankom
column4: dɛ ekyir nyankom a ɔfɔw asaase."
menyɛ wo dɛn? Hom papayɛ tse dɛ anapa fua
column5: na dɛ ɔbɔsu a ɔpɛ ntsɛm wew."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na medze nkɔnhyɛfo no etwitwa hɔn egu; na medze m'anomunsɛm ekuku hɔn: na m'atsɛmbu tse dɛ kan a opue."

column3: na nnyɛ okum afɔr a; na Nyame ho nyimdzee sen ɔhyew afɔr."
wɔtse dɛ Adam a wɔato ahyɛmu no: hɔ na woetwa me nkontompɔ."
dɛmara na asɔfokuw no dzi ewu wɔ Sekem afamu kwan no mu: nyew

column2: "Mehu enyinyandze wɔ Israel fi mu: hɔ na wohu ndwamandze wɔ Efraim

column3: hɔ ara so na wɔahyɛ otwaber ama wo
column4: ber a medze me man ndɔmmumkɔfo no bɛsan aba no."
